name: DON'T SHOOT US
description:
⭐ DON’T SHOOT US is a tactical shooter and survival game where players will have to try to survive as long as possible against hordes of infected of all kinds. DON’T SHOOT US offers innovative game mechanics, a unique shooting system, highly developed artificial intelligence. The scenario of DON’T SHOOT US can be compared to a documentary or a report on the daily work of police or military.⭐



DONT SHOOT US brings players cutting-edge gameplay, with all-new weapon handling, advanced AI system, photorealistic NANITE technology assets, new armory and other gameplay innovations that elevate this game to total immersion.

Between thugs, infected and allies, don’t shoot too fast ! Who knows ?...
